pages.text: By reinforcing a regular Cauldron with $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)Silver$(), you can create a Witch Cauldron.$(br2)This magical cauldron is extremely versatile in use and is namely used for $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)Oil Crafting$(), $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brewing$() and Teleportation.

pages.title: Teleportation
pages.text: To teleport with a Witch Cauldron, simply throw in an Ender Pearl, step on it, and say your destination. That destination must be another Witch Cauldron that has been named with a Name Tag.$(br2)Teleportation requires $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Altar Power$().

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Items can be tossed into the Witch Cauldron once it boils. To make it boil, place hot blocks such as Lava or Magma Blocks below it.$(br2)Note that the Witch Cauldron often requires $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Altar Power$(), except for $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)Oil Crafting$().
